alert.note: Alert for Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:42AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Meigs, southwestern Washington, southeastern Athens and west central Wood Counties through 915 AM EST... At 841 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pomeroy, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Belpre, Coolville, Forked Run State Park, Washington, Tuppers Plains, Lubeck, Chester, Belleville, Reedsville, Little Hocking, Darwin and Blennerhassett. This includes Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
